product_name: L'OrealRevitalift Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Eye Cream Treatment
summary: SummaryL'Or√©al Revitalift Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Eye Cream Treatment is a fragrance free, anti-aging eye cream with Pro-Retinol, Centella Asiatica to visibly reduce wrinkles, look of dark circles. Ophthalmologist tested for safety.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly reduce wrinkles, firm skin and reduce look of dark circlesImmediately: Skin feels softer, hydrated for 24 hoursIn 4 weeks: Dark circles are noticeably reduced, wrinkles look smoother, crow's feet appear less visibleFeaturesFormulated with Pro-retinol, a stabilized retinol derivative, and centella Asiatica, an herb from traditional Chinese medicine, helping repair the skin barrier to resist visibly signs of agingParaben free, Dye Free, Contact lens safe, Allergy tested, Ophthalmologist tested for safetyNon-greasy, absorbs quickly, all skin typesItem 2131025How To UseApply Revitalift Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Eye Cream Treatment in small dots around your eye with your ring finger and smooth gently until thoroughly absorbed in the morning and night to clean skin.IngredientsAqua / Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Propanediol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Shorea Robusta Seed Butter, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Paraffin Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Peg-20 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Cetyl Alcohol, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Stearyl Alcohol, Caffeine, Isohexadecane, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycine Soja Protein / Soybean Protein, Polysorbate 80, Retinyl Palmitate, Triethanolamine, Acetyl Trifluoromethylphenyl Valylglycine, Myristic Acid, Acrylonitrile/Methyl Methacrylate/Vinylidene Chloride Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Sorbitan Oleate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Faex Extract / Yeast Extract,, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Phenethyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Isobutane, Centella Asiatica Extract, Salicyloyl Phytosphingosine, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Bht.
how_to_use: Apply Revitalift Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Eye Cream Treatment in small dots around your eye with your ring finger and smooth gently until thoroughly absorbed in the morning and night to clean skin.
